tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Made his first PGA TOUR China Series cut when he T42 at the Buick Open in Guangzhou…Played on the weekend for the first time of the year when he T42 at the Buick Open in early May…Made the PGA TOUR China Series' second hole-in-one when he aced the 13th hole in the second round of the United Investment Real Estate Wuhan Open. Used a 9-iron for the ace on a hole he birdied in the first and third rounds. Finished 3-under on No. 13 for the week and went on to T13 at the tournament, 1-under overall…Continued his steady play when he finished T15 in early June at the Lanhai Open outside Shanghai. Only a final-round, 3-over 75 prevented him from securing his first top-10 finish…After missing the cut at the Earls Beijing Open, returned from the summer break with a T49 at the Yulongwan Yunnan Open. Started the tournament at Yulongwan GC with a 4-under 68 and closed with a 2-under 70. Finished T49…Next made cut came at the Jianye Tianzhu Henan Open. Finished T22 at St. Andrews Zhengzhou GC. 
2011: Missed the cut at the Volvo China Open.  
2008: Best finish was a T37, with five others, at the Tianjin Championship…Finished T64 at the Dell Championship at Xiamen G&CC, tying with Ning Jie Shi.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T13th in 2014 at the United Investment Real Estate Wuhan Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 94th in Career Money Leaders on the PGA Tour China Series.
